coding_practice.title: Map Sum Pairs
coding_practice.description:
Design a map that allows you to do the following:

Maps a string key to a given value.
Returns the sum of the values that have a key with a prefix equal to a given string.
Implement the MapSum class:

MapSum() Initializes the MapSum object.
void insert(String key, int val) Inserts the key-val pair into the map. If the key already existed, the original key-value pair will be overridden to the new one.
int sum(string prefix) Returns the sum of all the pairs' value whose key starts with the prefix.
coding_practice.constraints:
1 <= key.length, prefix.length <= 50
key and prefix consist of only lowercase English letters.
1 <= val <= 1000
At most 50 calls will be made to insert and sum.
coding_practice.explanation:
1. 使用字典 dic 儲存 key-value 對。
2. insert 時直接更新或新增 key 的值。
3. sum 時遍歷 dic 的所有 key，累加以 prefix 開頭的 value。
4. 返回累加值。
